version_description:
- New feature: custom text colors!
- iPhone 5 support.
- Fixes for some character sets (japanese,chinese).
- Changed download servers to improve performance and reliability.
- Minor improvements
- Bonus template.

- Fixed: bug after exporting.
- Minor interface adjustment.

- Awesome new feature: Background color effects. Now you can play with color effects and personalize the templates even more!
- Interface improvements
- Minor fixes: iPad external keyboard, custom music.

- Fixed Youtube and Facebook sharing;
- New side menu;
- New unlockable template!

This app has been updated by Apple to display the Apple Watch app icon.

- Fixes and improvements
- New template
